Column.Name: Distinct Risk Rating
Column.Formula: LET $result := TRIM(ARRAY_INDEX(SPLIT([Risk Ratings], ","), [LineNumber])); RETURN IF($result = "", NULL(), $result)

Column.Name: Distinct Background Colour
Column.Formula: LET $result := TRIM(ARRAY_INDEX(SPLIT([Risk Colours], ","), [LineNumber])); RETURN IF($result = "", NULL(), $result)

Column.Name: Distinct Text Colour
Column.Formula: LET $result := TRIM(ARRAY_INDEX(SPLIT([Risk Text Colours], ","), [LineNumber])); RETURN IF($result = "", NULL(), $result)

Column.Name: Parent Structure

FieldEntry.Formula: ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Risk Score], $(i, item) IF( $item >= 75, ARRAY_INDEX(SPLIT([Risk Ratings], ", "), 4), $item >= 50, ARRAY_INDEX(SPLIT([Risk Ratings], ", "), 3), $item >= 25, ARRAY_INDEX(SPLIT([Risk Ratings], ", "), 2), $item >= 0, ARRAY_INDEX(SPLIT([Risk Ratings], ", "), 1) ) )

Label.Text: Risk Ratings (low to high, comma separated):
Background colours (low to high, comma separated):
Text colours (low to high, comma separated):
